name: British Empire
declaringWar: By the grace of God, your days are numbered.
defeated: You have triumphed over us. The day is yours.
introduction: We are pleased to meet you.
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in a trade agreement with England?
uniqueName: The Sun Never Sets On The British Empire

name: Galactic Empire
startIntroPart1: It has come to my attention the fact that this land has valuable resources to the Empire. You are to investigate and obtain these resources.
startIntroPart2: Do not fail me, Commander. If enemies of the Empire are found in this land, exterminate them.
declaringWar: Your lack of foresight will be your demise.
attacked: I will show you the power of the Dark Side.
introduction: I have altered the deal. Pray I do not alter it any further.
hateHello: I am surprised you still live.
tradeRequest: It would be unwise for you to enrage my master
uniques: +30% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities
